example.text: I want to tell them that Congress is doing everything we can to protect them, but I can't. Unfortunately, many Republicans are failing them and us by refusing to pass basic, commonsense, lifesaving gun violence prevention legislation.

It’s long past time for serious bipartisan discussions to fix our immigration system. These discussions must be focused on human rights and dignity, expanding legal pathways, and enforcing border security.
Colorado was among the first in the nation to lead a successful pilot program that returns energy from electric school buses back to our power grid.
Mr. Speaker, here are some facts. Fact number one, Donald Trump remains one of the greatest dangers to our democracy that we have ever seen, and he is a demagogue.

Protecting Our Troops, Veterans and US Defense As a proud Army veteran and member of the House Armed Services and House Intelligence Committees, I take my responsibility seriously to ensure we are doing right by our men and women in uniform. In this year's defense and intelligence spending bills, I passed 29 of my priorities to ensure Colorado remains on the frontier of technology against our adversaries, advancing US climate leadership, and meeting the needs of our servicemembers and their families with a 4.6% pay raise for our troops.
